title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 181.2 - Permits for survey and retrieval of objects of historical interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 181.2 - Permits for survey and retrieval of objects of historical interest

State Regulations
(a) Permits, valid
for a period not exceeding one year, to survey and retrieve objects of
historical interest situated on or under State property, may be issued to
qualified public agencies, historical societies, museums, other educational
institutions and individuals. (b) Discovery and retrieval of objects of historical interest on State property
shall be reported to the Commissioner of Education. (c) Permits issued under the provisions of
this Part may be revoked at any time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
181.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
